perturbation.original_text: 7.2 No Representation as to Number of Users, Capabilities or Revenue Hereunder. For the avoidance of doubt, and notwithstanding any portion of this Agreement to the contrary, no party to this Agreement has made and no party to this Agreement does hereby make any representation or warranty with respect to the quantity of Company-Skype Branded Customers (if any) that shall arise hereunder, the commercial success of the Company-Skype Branded Application, Company-Skype Toolbar or Company-Skype Branded Web Site, the future features or functionality of the Company-Skype Branded Application, Company-Skype Toolbar or the aggregate revenues to be received by the parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.2 No Representation as to Number of Users, Capabilities or Revenue Hereunder. For the avoidance of doubt, and notwithstanding any portion of this Agreement to the contrary, no party to this Agreement guarantees the minimum quantity of Company-Skype Branded Users that shall arise hereunder, the commercial success of the Company-Skype Branded Tool, Company-Skype App or Company-Skype Branded Internet Page, the future potential or efficiency of the Company-Skype Branded Tool, Company-Skype App or the revenues to be received by the parties to this binding document.
perturbation.explanation: The original text makes no representation of the number of customers, whereas the changed text says that the document guarantees the minimum numbers of Company-Skype Branded Users, resulting in conflicting obligations. Also, terms like 'Application' are modified to 'App,' 'Toolbar' to 'Tool,' and 'Web Site' to 'Internet Page,' which are used interchangeably without proper definition.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1 Non-Competition.
8.1.1 Each Party agrees that, for a period of five years (“Non-Competition Period”) from the Effective Date (“End Date”), no Party, nor any of their respective Affiliates, will enter into an agreement with any third party, or otherwise carry on any business, directly or indirectly, which is focused on, and targets, primarily Consumers within the PRC, and (i) in the case of Skype and Skype Holding, which provides for a co-branded Internet-based application in simplified Chinese similar in functionality and features as the Company-Skype Branded Application (as may be updated or upgraded from time to time) (and for the avoidance of doubt, a co-branded Internet-based application in simplified Chinese shall be similar in functionality and features as the Company-Skype Branded Application only in the event such application is a customized co-branded version of the Skype Software having one or more functionality or features contained in the Company-Skype Branded Application), or provides for distribution in the PRC of the Skype Software in simplified Chinese by a Primarily PRC Based Service Provider; and (ii) in the case of Online BVI, Tom Holding and the Company, which provides for any voice over internet protocol and/or instant messaging products or services that compete or are likely to compete with the Skype Software.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1 Non-Competition.
8.1.1 Each Company agrees that, for a period of ten years (“Non-Compete Term”) from the Start Date (“Expiry Date”), no Company, nor any of their respective Subsidiaries, will participate in an understanding with any fourth party, or otherwise engage in any commerce, directly or indirectly, which is concentrated on, and focuses, primarily Individuals inside the PRC, and (i) in the case of Skype and Skype Holding, which allows for a jointly-badged web-based program in simplified Chinese comparable in operation and characteristics as the Company-Skype Branded Tool (as may be refreshed or improved from time to time) (and for clarification, a jointly-badged web-based program in simplified Chinese shall be comparable in operation and characteristics as the Company-Skype Branded Program only if such program is a tailored jointly-badged version of the Skype System possessing one or more operations or characteristics included in the Company-Skype Branded App), or allows for dissemination in the PRC of the Skype System in simplified Chinese by a Mainly PRC Based Service Supplier; and (ii) in the case of Online BVI, Tom Holding and the Corporation, which permits any voice over internet protocol and/or instant correspondence wares or amenities that rival or are liable to rival the Skype System.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text changes 'Party' to 'Company,' 'Affiliates' to 'Subsidiaries,' 'agreement' to 'understanding,' 'business' to 'commerce,' 'Consumers' to 'Individuals', 'application' to 'program,' and 'Software' to 'System.'  These terms are used interchangeably without clear definition, leading to confusion. Furthermore, the duration of the non-compete period is changed from 5 years to 10 years. The original states no affiliate can 'enter into an agreement' whereas the modified text replaces this to 'participate in an understanding.' Also, 'End Date' is changed to 'Expiry Date', and 'Effective Date' to 'Start Date.'

perturbation.original_text: 8.3 Termination of Non-Competition Period. Notwithstanding any portion of the foregoing to the contrary, the Non-Competition Period shall terminate prior to the End Date, and for the avoidance of doubt, no party shall be obligated to comply with the restrictions set out in Section 8.1 after the termination of the Non-Competition Period:
perturbation.changed_text: 8.3 Termination of Non-Compete Term. Notwithstanding any part of the preceding to the contrary, the Non-Compete Provision shall commence before the Expiry Date, and for the avoidance of uncertainty, no company shall be mandated to adhere to the limitations laid down in Section 8.1 following the commencement of the Non-Compete Provision:
perturbation.explanation: Here, the terms 'Non-Competition Period' is replaced with 'Non-Compete Term', 'End Date' is replaced with 'Expiry Date', 'party' to 'company' and 'obligated' to 'mandated.' There are multiple changed terms with similar intention. Also, 'termination' is replaced with 'commencement' which can have contradictory effects.
